trans-unit.source: Determines whether Internet Protocol version 6 is enabled on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o protocolo IP versão 6 está ativado no computador local.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.Ipv6Element"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.Ipv6Element"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor adds the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.Ipv6Element.Enabled%2A> property to the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor adiciona o <xref:System.Net.Configuration.Ipv6Element.Enabled%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.Properties%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement.Properties%2A> </xref:System.Net.Configuration.Ipv6Element.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether Internet Protocol version 6 is enabled on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor booleano que indica se o protocolo IP versão 6 está ativada no computador local.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if IPv6 is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o IPv6 estiver ativado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
